ActBank of Canada Act
PrecisAppointment of KPMG LLP, Chartered Accountants of Ottawa, Ontario, to audit the affairs and to perform the annual audits of the Bank of Canada for the five fiscal years commencing on January 1, 2009 and terminating on December 31, 2013.
